creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Hanging of gold colored cut velvet with design of large lotus blossoms and twining leaves in blue and coral color on gold thread ground. Tin the corners of the field archaic dragons (?). Outer border of profile dragons and Heavenly Jewel in colors of the field. Inner border of Greek key meander. Piece made up of two widths seamed length-wise. Lining of mustard yellow cotton. Inscription
title: Hanging Rug
